descriptions: No goals are identified or goals are vague and unfocused.
Goals are somewhat identified but lack clarity and specificity.
Goals are identified with some clarity but could be more specific and measurable.
Goals are clear and specific, outlining desired outcomes for remaining drug-free.
Goals are very clear, specific, and include measurable components and timelines.
Goals are exceptionally clear, specific, measurable, achievable, relevant, and time-bound (SMART goals) demonstrating a strong commitment to remaining drug-free.
Demonstrates no understanding of strategies for remaining drug-free.
Demonstrates limited understanding of strategies; strategies are unrealistic or ineffective.
Demonstrates a basic understanding of some strategies, but application is unclear.
Demonstrates a solid understanding of effective strategies and their application to personal circumstances.
Demonstrates a comprehensive understanding of a wide range of strategies and can adapt them to various situations.
Demonstrates exceptional understanding of drug-free strategies, including prevention and coping mechanisms, tailored to personal needs.
Goals show no personal relevance or commitment to remaining drug-free.
Goals show minimal personal relevance or commitment; motivation is unclear.
Goals show some personal relevance and a limited commitment to remaining drug-free.
Goals are personally relevant and demonstrate a moderate commitment to remaining drug-free.
Goals are highly personally relevant and reflect a strong commitment to remaining drug-free; identifies personal values that support the goal.
Goals are deeply personally relevant, reflecting a profound commitment to remaining drug-free, and are integrated into a broader vision for a healthy life.
No support systems are identified.
Identifies a limited or inappropriate support system.
Identifies at least one support system, but its effectiveness is questionable.
Identifies appropriate support systems and explains how they can be utilized.
Identifies multiple robust support systems and explains how they will be actively engaged for support.
Identifies a comprehensive network of support systems, including family, friends, and professional resources, and has a clear plan for utilizing them effectively.
